Name: PLAYspace Virtual Music Library
About the game: PLAYspace - virtual spatial music library with amazing FX player. Create a collection of your favorite music in 3D environment. - Arrange albums like wall posters - Sort by location - PLAY music in fullscreen mode with visual effects or switch program to desktop mini player - Expand your library with new environments (DLC) Add your music files to PLAYspace and immerse yourself in the vast ocean of sound.
